name: ziply
description: A minimal and dynamic web app for compressing images, merging PDFs, and converting image formats

scripts.build: npm install && cd client && npm install && npm run build
scripts.start: cd server && npm install && npm start
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
